text:
A Moment of Change

A dark street, Raskolnikov in turmoil.  
His heart races with desperate resolve.  
Raskolnikov: “It must end today! No more!”  

---  

A girl sings, hope in her voice.  
Raskolnikov watches, lost in thought.  
Raskolnikov: “Do you like street music?”  
Man: “Uh, yes... why?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov, in a moment of calm determination, resolves that his life must change immediately, despite not knowing how to achieve it.
